email.subject: Congratulations
email.body:
Greetings #PLAYERNAME#, Congratulations on completing Hacknet: Traced! This extension was the largest extension I've ever made, and I've learned a lot of things from it.
Big thanks to Fayti1703 for the colossal number of questions I asked him, and to RubberDuckShobe for some playtesting.
This extension was created over 37 days and I had a lot of fun making it.
Take a look at the credits server linked below to completely end the extension once and for all.
Thanks for playing! Samaritan
